News.Title: Teerth Gopicon Awarded 1200 MW Solar Projects by NHPC
News.Summary: Teerth Gopicon has received a Letter of Award from NHPC (National Hydroelectric Power Corporation) for the development of 1200 MW solar power projects. This significant contract represents a major opportunity for Teerth Gopicon in the renewable energy sector.

News.Title: NHPC Awards 1200 MW Solar Project to Teerth Gopicon
News.Summary: Teerth Gopicon has received a Letter of Award from NHPC (National Hydroelectric Power Corporation) for the development of 1200 MW solar projects. This significant contract marks a major milestone for Teerth Gopicon in the renewable energy sector.

News.Title: Teerth Gopicon Signs MoU with Madhya Pradesh Government for ₹1500 Crore Project
News.Summary: Teerth Gopicon has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Madhya Pradesh government for a project worth 1500 crore rupees. The company, which currently has a market capitalization of 420 crore rupees, is set to undertake this significant venture in partnership with the state government.

News.Title: Teerth Gopicon Secures Lowest Bid for NHPC Project
News.Summary: Teerth Gopicon has been declared the lowest bidder for tender documents issued by NHPC (National Hydroelectric Power Corporation). The bid project cost is reported to be 202 million rupees.

News.Title: Teerth Gopicon Secures Tender for High-Rise Tower Project
News.Summary: Teerth Gopicon has announced that it has secured a tender for acquiring a land parcel intended for a high-rise tower project. The company estimates that this project will generate revenue of 1.85 billion rupees.
